item.title: Saving Private Data
item.description: __ The Interwebs So, I have been contemplating this thought for a while and I donâ€™t know where I stand on this. What has been the collective impact of the internet on our world? I know the status is ever changing, we have come through a lot of movements and I am also a fairly pessimistic person. But I still believe the collective good far outweighs the collective harm.
